title: How to apply for GCC Unified Visa: Step-by-step guide, documents checklist for Schengen-style visa to 6 Gulf countries
summary_full: The GCC is launching a unified tourist visa, allowing entry to all six member states with a single online application. Travellers can expect a streamlined digital process, requiring essential documents like a valid passport, itinerary and proof of funds. This initiative aims to simplify multi-country travel across Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain and Oman.
